What happens to the weapon of the guard in this scenario?
The guard would normally have to draw a weapon, so either way the weapon is not in the guard’s hand at that moment.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the main purpose of the player's description in this scenario?
Most importance, as it builds the story and makes the game more interesting and fun.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the mechanical effect on the game when the player adds something that affects future dice rolls?
There is only a mechanical effect on the game when the player goes beyond color and adds something that will affect future dice rolls.
You are a helpful assistant.
What should the game master do when a player's suggestion seems reasonable?
You can allow it, but don’t make life too easy for the player—remember that this is a horror game.

What should the game master do when unsure about allowing a player's suggestion?
You can ask for a Luck roll.

Ask questions of the players and suggest what more might be done to justify the roll
